resources.string: Are you sure you’d like to skip this puzzle?
Are you sure you’d like to reset this puzzle?

%s lists all the information of your device and offers tools to developers.

Made by the Netherlands’ top Android developers at Pixplicity, this app shows you all the useful information you might want to know about a phone or tablet: hardware features, screen size, resolution and density, ip-addresses, camera specs, OS information… you name it!

Anonymous data may be sent to Pixplicity with your explicit consent. This will be used to gather statistics about existing devices, and the results will at one point be delivered through this app.

THIS APP COMES WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND AND IS COPYRIGHT OF PIXPLICITY B.V., THE NETHERLANDS.

This app uses the following libraries, licensed under the Apache License 2.0:

• EasyPrefs by Pixplicity
• Letter Press by Pixplicity
• Otto by Square Inc.
• Picasso by Square Inc.
• recycler-fast-scroll by FutureMind

Public IP address provided by http://whatismyip.akamai.com/.
